title: United Kingdom Monthly GDP MoM
description: Monthly GDP MoM in the United Kingdom decreased to -0.60 percent in September from -0.10 percent in August of 2022. Monthly GDP MoM in the United Kingdom averaged 0.16 percent from 1997 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 9 percent in June of 2020 and a record low of -20.90 percent in April of 2020. GDP measures the value of goods and services produced in the UK. The reading refers to a month-over-month growth rate. This page includes a chart with historical data for the United Kingdom Monthly GDP MoM.
author: Office for National Statistics
